text: around 240 we were called for a report
of an active shooter our officers were
on the scene very very quickly I think
it was around 60 seconds or a minute min
and a half and and they did engage the
suspect and that's when he was taken
into custody there are five fatalities
that we know of there are several other
persons that are gravely injured those
who are injured have been transported
for medical care to enter on the Medical
Center and to Johns Hopkins Shock Trauma
